name: Herb & Garlic Dip
description: The perfect dip to go with crudités (use whatever’s in season, we love celery, peas, carrots, peppers & cucumbers).
preparation: In a bowl, combine dip mix, sour cream, and mayo.
tips: For optimum flavour let dip sit 20 min before serving.

products.name: Herb & Garlic Dip Mix
summary: Classic notes of chives, onion & garlic.
